message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $750000. I think this is a fair price considering its value, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! However, I'm not sure if $750000 is the best value for me. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $600000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the market value, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $675000. I believe this price still reflects the product's unique value, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
